page.pageName: [ZT PMM] New plans page-Zero trust services

metaTags.metaDescription: Explore our Zero Trust offerings and find the plan that's right for your business to secure users, devices, and networks.

navigationLinks.title: What Is Cloudflare?
navigationLinks.description: Cloudflare is the foundation for your infrastructure, applications, and teams.

navigationLinks.title: One of the Largest Global Networks
navigationLinks.description: Learn about the Cloudflare Network.

navigationLinks.title: Blog
navigationLinks.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

navigationLinks.title: Continuously Innovating
navigationLinks.description: View the latest product updates.

navigationLinks.title: Trusted Partner to Millions
navigationLinks.description: Read customer stories, case studies, and more.

navigationLinks.title: Trust Hub
navigationLinks.description: Explore the policies, technologies, and third-party certifications that make this trust possible.

navigationLinks.title: Privacy & Data Protection
navigationLinks.description: Explore our privacy policies, discover our privacy-focused products, and learn how we support regulatory requirements like the GDPR.

navigationLinks.title: Certifications
navigationLinks.description: Learn about Cloudflare's adherence to industry-standard security compliance certifications and regulations.

navigationLinks.title: Trust & Safety
navigationLinks.description: Learn about our response to requests from law enforcement, and our approach to abuse.

navigationLinks.title: GDPR
navigationLinks.description: Learn how European companies can use Cloudflare to help meet their GDPR obligations.

navigationLinks.title: Legal Documentation
navigationLinks.description: Cloudflare's Privacy Policy and more legal documentation.

navigationLinks.title: Cloudflare vs. Zscaler
navigationLinks.description: Which better fuels transformation? Pick an architecture designed for the future of networking.

navigationLinks.title: Cloudflare vs. Cisco Umbrella
navigationLinks.description: Choose Cloudflare over Cisco Umbrella for DNS filtering and Zero Trust. Plus, explore a limited-time promo

navigationLinks.title: Learning Center
navigationLinks.description: Resources on cyber security and how the Internet works from Cloudflare.

navigationLinks.title: Security
navigationLinks.description: Learn about common web application vulnerabilities and how they can be mitigated.

navigationLinks.title: DDoS
navigationLinks.description: Explore details about how DDoS attacks function, and how they can be stopped.

navigationLinks.title: Bot Management
navigationLinks.description: Some bots are good. Some bots are bad. Learn the difference and how to stop the bad ones.

navigationLinks.title: SSL
navigationLinks.description: What is SSL? What's the difference between SSL and TLS? Learn it all here.

navigationLinks.title: Protect Users and Applications
navigationLinks.description: Identity and access management (IAM) systems verify user identities and control user privileges.

navigationLinks.title: Performance
navigationLinks.description: Understand why fast site speed is crucial and what hurts and improves site performance.

navigationLinks.title: CDN
navigationLinks.description: Explore how a CDN works under the hood to deliver fast, efficient and secure delivery of content to websites and Internet services.

navigationLinks.title: DNS
navigationLinks.description: DNS is what lets users connect to websites using domain names instead of IP addresses. Learn how DNS works.

navigationLinks.title: Cloud
navigationLinks.description: The cloud is made up of servers in data centers all over the world. Moving to the cloud can save companies money and add convenience for users.

navigationLinks.title: Serverless
navigationLinks.description: What is serverless computing and what are the advantages? Explore that here.

navigationLinks.title: Email Security
navigationLinks.description: Email security is the practice of preventing email-based cyber attacks, protecting email accounts from takeover, and securing the contents of emails.

navigationLinks.title: Network Layer
navigationLinks.description: The network layer is layer 3 in the OSI model, and it is responsible for connections between different networks.

navigationLinks.title: Enterprises
navigationLinks.description: Enterprise-grade security and performance for mission-critical applications

navigationLinks.title: Developers
navigationLinks.description: You write code, we handle the rest

navigationLinks.description: Protecting the free and open Internet

navigationLinks.description: Project Galileo offers cyber security protection for at-risk websites

navigationLinks.description: Explore Cloudflare white papers, webinars, videos, product guides, and more.

navigationLinks.title: Case Studies
navigationLinks.description: Learn how companies like yours are leveraging our platform.

navigationLinks.title: Solution & Product Guides
navigationLinks.description: Detailed guides about Cloudflare's products and solutions.

navigationLinks.description: Learn what leading industry analysts have to say about Cloudflare and our suite of products and solutions.

mainLink.title: Peering Portal
mainLink.description: Send traffic directly to the Cloudflare network

relatedBlades.title: Security, Performance, and Reliability - all in one package
Core Features
relatedBlades.description: Secure users, devices, and networks with Zero Trust browsing and application access. All of our pricing plans start with the same base set of security controls designed to bring the power of Cloudflare's global edge network.

plansList.description: Essential security controls to keep employees and apps protected online. Best for teams under 50 users, or proof-of-concept test runs.

features.title: Up to 24 hours of activity logging
Community forums available for tips and troubleshooting

plansList.description: Protects access to anything on your network and the Internet. Best for teams over 50 users that do not require enterprise support services.
plansList.additionalTermsText: *Add Browser Isolation for an additional $10 per user

features.title: Up to 30 days of activity logging
4 hour median initial response time for urgent issues

plansList.description: Best for organizations that want security transformation backed by maximum support, visibility, connectivity and interoperability.
plansList.additionalTermsText: *Add Browser Isolation based on a custom quote per user

features.title: Up to 6 months of DNS activity logging
1 hour median initial response time for urgent issues

relatedBlades.entryTitle: AddOn-Zero Trust Browser Isolation - New Plans Page
relatedBlades.caption: ADD-ON
relatedBlades.title: Zero Trust Browser Isolation
relatedBlades.description: Faster than any legacy remote browser. Natively integrated in the Cloudflare Zero Trust policy builder, allowing administrators to allow, block, or isolate any security or content category and application group.

addOns.title: Cloudflare Browser Isolation

content.value: Execute all browser code in the cloud

addOns.pricingText: Starting at $10 per user (only available with paid plans)
